L

Lab5 - package Lab5
 
leaderFollower() - Method in class Lab5.Queue
Leader section: When a leader arrives it acquires the mutex If there is a follower waiting, the leader decrements the follower count and releases the followerQueue for another follower The leader and follower proceed to dance and release the mutex lock for another thread If there is no follower waiting, the leader acquires the leaderQueue but gives up the mutex to wait on a follower
leaderQueue - Variable in class Lab5.Queue
 
leaders - Variable in class Lab5.Queue
Variables initialised: leaders = counter for number of leaders followers = counter for number of followers mutex = used to guarantee exclusive access to counters leaderQueue = queue where leaders wait followerQueue = queue where followers wait executor = a thread pool
